desc: Sourcing, Product Development and Supply Chain Management solutions for designers, brands, distributors, retailers and factories. DirecSource works with partners to perform one specific function or offer complete service from product development to package delivery to the customer. Shop our site for selected products.

layout.text:
We develop clear and easy to understand product specifications for our customers, allowing you to clearly visualize and track every single aspect of the product - Making you the expert on the products you make.
Be the hero and start managing high and low risk areas of your product.
